powergrid.model.interact

Interface ComplexInteractable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Interactable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Canoe, CharterShip, EntranaBoat, FairyRing, Gate, GnomeGlider, HotAirBalloon, IcebergBoat, JatizsoBoat, Lodestone, LunarIsleShip, MagicCarpet, Minecart, MiscellaniaShip, MusaPointShip, NeitiznotBoat, PiratesCove, Portal, ShiloCart, Shortcut, SpiritTree, Teleportable, TeleportItem.Destination, Transportable, WaterbirthIsle

    public interface ComplexInteractable
extends Interactable
    ComplexInteractable is an extension on Interactable for all more extensive interactions. Interface representing complex interactions. Checks must be made to ensure the interaction is allowed.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isAllowed(java.lang.String method)
      This method checks if all requirements for this Complex Interaction are met.

      • Methods inherited from interface powergrid.model.interact.Interactable

        interact, interact

    • Method Detail

      • isAllowed

        boolean isAllowed(java.lang.String method)
        This method checks if all requirements for this Complex Interaction are met.

        If this method returns true, it cannot be guaranteed that the interact method will successfully execute the interaction. It merely means all requirements for the interaction are met (as far as PowerWalk can observe).

        Parameters:
        method - the method of interaction.
        Returns:
        whether the interaction is allowed.
